title: EU’s new rules for Big Tech will come into force in Spring 2023, says Vestager - TechCrunch
content: EU’s new rules for Big Tech will come into force in Spring 2023, says Vestager  TechCrunch
description: The European Union’s flagship reform for tackling Big Tech platform power, the Digital Markets Act (DMA), will come into force in early 2023, Commission EVP Margrethe Vestager has said — rowing back from an earlier suggested timeframe of this fall. But she also implied that enforcements…
